page.title: 11EDUCATION - 2
page.content:
{EDUCATION (2)
The Primary School - some traditions. During the year there are several events which take place in school and in and around Cartmel. In October the Harvest Festival is held in the Priory Church. We decorate the font as part of our thanksgiving service. In 1985 our theme was bees so we made pictures and models of bees and honeycombs. Living in the countryside we like to keep our surroundings beautiful. In November 1985 we planted a silver birch tree in the school grounds. We hope to do something like this each year. On the last day of summer term we climb up Hampsfell and have a school pic-nic by the hospice. We play games and fly kites. {Sarah Southworth 10
